title: Five Nights at Freddy's Security Breach Gameplay Markiplier Reaction 4k 8k HD Trailer Secret Full

comments.comment: You had me at “ Five Nights at Freddy's Security Breach Gameplay Markiplier Reaction 4k 8k HD Trailer Secret Full”

“I've done YouTube for too long, I've become a parody of myself, this is ridiculous”
Best quote in the entire video

OMG I'M STUNNED! The Glamrock Freddy on the Thumbnail was created by my art team before the game and now is here! I feel honored and glad by this! I follow pewds since the era of Amnesia, Ju-On, Ao Oni... I'm proud of my team and to me this is wonderful to see this image is everywhere now. Thanks pewds! You are amazing! Cheers!

Jacksepticeye when sees freddy: Dad!!
Markiplier when sees freddy: PET
Pewdiepie when sees feddy: Mark?

Me : *sees the most unconvincing title*

Also me : "I'm sold"
Probably the most convincing title I’ve ever seen
I fr thought he was just gonna react to Marks play through of Security Breach lmao

mark while playing this: depression
pewds while playing this: aggressive parkour and rapping
I love that Mattpat spent SOO long looking for the battery upgrade and eventually just gave up, meanwhile it's one of the first things Felix finds in the daycare lmaoo.

Mark: check
Felix: check
We’ll just have to wait for Sean to recover and this will finally be completed

Edit: Sean: check
I never thoughts I’d live to see the day where PewDiePie controls Markiplier in a FNAF video game
I just love how EVERYONE gets different glitches in the game XD

“Let me go inside you mark”
Was a line i never thought I’d ever hear from pewds
Well Felix ain't wrong. Mark has the perfect voice for Freddy

Pewds playing every other FNaF game: "This is stupid, it's not scary, I don't even like this series."

New game comes out, and some fans are a little disappointed with it
Pewds: "Wow, it's actually pretty cool and kinda creepy now! Finally!"
I love how Pewds makes fun about furries when seeing Roxanne but when he gets to Chica it's like "YEAA!! ITS MY GIRL CHICA!"
Ah shit, here we go again. This is like the 3rd playthrough I've watched now

Sun: Grabs him while he's in the ball pit
Pewdiepie: Stares 
Also Pewdiepie 1 second later: Gets scared

It feel so NOSTALGIC having both Pewds and Markiplier playing FNAF again, it feels cozy and highly entertaining to watch even though both of them probably 
don't get scared at all at the same level as before anymore.
I love that fact that he has been so desensitized to horror.
His titles are getting better day by day. What a legend
i love how everyone who loved the old games is disappointed by the new one and everyone who was disappointed by the old games loves the new one

"How do I control the cameras? Doesnt matter"
In a series where controlling cameras is like THE most important thing

Pewdiepie: "Why are subtitles never default?"
Me, with a hearing disability: "I ask the same question everyday man"
He isn't just reacting to Markiplier. He is controling him. He is now the king of the king of fnaf.
I did not expect him to even touch this game, amazing
I really love how he parodies youtubers doing fake screams.

I haven't watched you in a while, Pewds. The kid that watched your heavy rain vids to destress from her GCSEs is all grown up and busy having a tough adult time from the holidays. It really felt like the old times when you started singing the save station song. 

Thanks for still being here for me, and many others watching.
That save station reference was so nostalgic holy crap
After the “save station~” nostalgia I was expecting “when the light is gone and you can’t go on, batteries~” for the flashlight section
He switches from insulting furries to going wild over chica.
I genuinely thought Mark voiced Freddy it sounds so much like him
Please don't let this become a one-episode series.

"Who wants Candies?"
Felix : "Can deez nuts"
Lmao reacting to Felix makes me realized that horror game isn't actually scary, it's just me overreacting

Pewdiepie was very competent with the game's mechanics and instructions, I'm so impressed. Maybe he watched some other playthroughs (i.e. Matpat, Markiplier, etc.) to know where to go but that doesn't take away how efficient he's been with it. Good job to Pewdiepie, this playthrough feels unique for some reason.
The fact that he is the chilliest YouTuber who play this game...
YESSS I wanted pewds to play this the instant this came out I don't know why but his playthroughs are always unique lol.

I appreciate Pewds being a smidge more positive towards a Fnaf related game. I don’t expect him to play more but I appreciate him trying.

Edit. Thanks for noticin' me 100+ people
Every time a FNAF games comes out, Mark gets his crown back
The way Felix plays horror games now is so soothing lol
12:48 good job sive, that was good
hope he's gonna keep playing this, its soo enjoyable watching him
17:12 really got my DBD senses kicked in, made me think I was gonna miss the skill check.
Really appreciate the skill check sound from Sive when he activated the generator.
15:19 the delayed reaction has me crying
This is funny as hell. God I missed his commentary, and the delayed screams after the jumpscares is gold
I already watched Moist play this, but this should still be fun lol

I was low key hoping that he would just have a clip from Mark's video in the beginning as a joke just so it would make us all go:
"Wait..."
Genuinely expected him to just watch mark play the game and react to that
Seeing how much effort they put into the new fnaf game really makes me happy. They made simple games for years & just turn it on its head. Great game

Honestly I’m happy Scott is finally doing something different (with the help of steelwool of course) like I did enjoy the first like four games but then it just felt the same. I lost any passion on playing it and I just watched people play it instead but I may actually play this one too. It looks fun.
2:41 the save station really takes me back to that alien isolation letsplay, it's so nostalgic

The game gets better near the end, If you do a full on lets play, please get the true ending. It has an actual disturbing animatronic at the end, and its really impressive.
Also, even the fnaf commnity thinks the jumpscares are bad, your not alone.

3:20
Roxy talking to herself
Pewds: “it’s weird seeing furries talking to themselves”
That title convinced me to move out of my parent's basement and get a job, thank you Felix!

Expectation: watching pewds playing the game 

Reality: SAVE STATION, I LOVE MY SAVE STATION BROS~~~

I like how he specifically used Markiplier, the king of FNaF, for the title lmao.

The views on Mark are booming. As of now, this video was uploaded 5 hours ago with a little over 500k views, Mark uploaded his fourth Security Breach video 4 hours ago with over a million views.

I'm so happy the save station song came back!! Ever since pewds first did it, that and the batteries one from outlast. My brain has been on a constant loop with random outbursts singing them!! I feel like my life is now complete
I’m surprised on how far PewDiePie went into the campaign in a short amount of time
Markiplier sure have changed since I last checked up on him
Ahhh the nostalgia hit hard “save station…” and “stomp… and loot!”

Pewds : "it's weird looking at furries when they don't know anyone is watching them"
Also Pewds : "Awh, it's my gurl Chica, 
I love Chica, she's so hot !"
Stage 1 : Denial [3:20]
I really did not expect anything from this game and in the end I was pleasantly surprised, I hope they fix the optimization problems.

FNAF back then: 
Animatronics bad, Security guard good
FNAF now:
Freddy protec, Guard attac
17:13 lol the DBD skillcheck sound
Glad you played it too because this is no longer the old "point and click" that you're tired of.
We just need jack and this saga will be fully complete.

Pewdiepie uploading a FNAF video:
Feels weird, but I'll allow it
1:58 When Sive adds the vine boom. I can't breathe
2:52 I like how he still remembers these moments from all those years ago
the sound effect after freddy said “who? your mother?” had me so weak
The save station part filled my heart because I love his little save station tune

"Save Station!"
"GOTTA LOVE MA SAVE STATION!" 
It was Soo funny how Felix was being caught by that Chica animatronic!!! Also I can't wait to see what happens next!!!
Loved how he was caught by that jester thing!
as a FNAF fan I can say that this game is amazing and I think it gets the recognition it deserves
Pewds accidentally found a handy exploit - saving the game resets positions of enemies.
Pt 2 pls
The Dead by Daylight skill check sound when the generator was powered caught me off guard.

I love it when pewds says something 
Pewds: “ I hope I won’t get in trouble “
I really hope you continue playing this game! Your reaction to it is one of the few that I look forward to on YouTube ️

9:54
Felix: The security guard is blind

Mark: [has war flashbacks]

I really thought markiplier uploaded for a second. I was waiting for the 4th part all day.

Nice job pewds :')
I was going to watch Mark's gameplay. But since Felix has Mark's reaction in 4K 8K HD, I came here. Thanks Pewds, very cool.
love the title, very informative thank you felix.
2:00 The Vine boom is perfect. Sive really is best editor.
The fucking pewdiepie save station thing made me feel so much nostalgia I just wanna bro fist my screen
13:51 pewds finally gone insane once again! Fnaf brings the old stuff back
That was actually really cool! The semi open world horror game was executed nicely :)
When I first saw the save station in a previous playthrough, pewds' sing-songy "save station" voice from old games replayed in my head a couple times hahaha. I'm glad he reacted to it!

11:33 I like the way how Pewds was just silent since Chica jump scared him, and then at that moment, he was like “AAHHH!” Like he screamed just now.  Like I get why, since he didn’t see what was coming…
I have already watched 3 playthroughts but I was literally waiting for this one
Im very glad that everyone is giving this game a chance cus it deserves it tbh.
I said Freddy sounds like markiplier right before pewds said they should’ve casted him
Just one more time for old times sale, I’d love to see PewDiePie and markiplier collaborate :)
15:14 the reason I know I've been on YouTube way too long is because that was my first thought the first time I saw Sundrop dive into the ball pit.
I’m glad to see that even Pewds is starting to play FNAF Security Breach
Awhhh I love the “save station” ref
This is one of the most beautiful games I have ever seen. Just need to forget the cringe of the fandom xD
Everything in this game could’ve been avoided if this kid just waited in the lobby in a hiding place until it opened.
I say we make all come together to get PewDiePie to play his older games again. (Stake 3, 5na F, happy wheels, Minecraft)

I must say Scott came along way with this series

This is probably the best fnaf game I’ve seen. It reminds me of “the joy of creation.”its the most replayable game out of the series. There are some bugs he has to work out, but besides from that this is a pretty damn good fnaf game.
7/10 ign
